desc: Little Skein is the online home of San Francisco knitting artist and maker Anne Vally. She creates small batch, handmade kits for knitters and hand-dyes yarn to add beauty, depth, and inspiration to your making practice.

layout.text: HI! I'M ANNE: A MAKER, KNITTING ARTIST, AND BELIEVER IN THE COMMON GOOD. I CREATE PATTERNS FOR KNITWEAR, HAND-DYE YARN, AND MAKE MY OWN CLOTHES.
